General.Name: Ba Ria Thermal Power JSC
General.Description: Ba Ria Thermal Power Joint Stock Company engages in the production and trading of electricity in Vietnam. The company is also involved in the management, operation, maintenance, repair, and renovation of electrical equipment, hydroelectric works, and architecture of hydroelectric plants; and testing, and calibration of equipment for ships. In addition, it produces and trades in bottled water; and engages in passenger transportation and construction investment businesses. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Ba Ria, Vietnam. Ba Ria Thermal Power Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Power Generation Corporation 3.
